title: Daily Exercise Routines for pets
content: Regular exercise is crucial for your dog's physical and mental health. Aim for 30 minutes to 2 hours daily depending on breed and age.
tips: Start with short walks for child pets
Vary the routes to keep it interesting

title: Pet Dental Care
content: Dental health is often overlooked in cats. Regular dental care prevents serious health issues later in life.

title: Pet Nutrition Basics
content: Proper nutrition forms the foundation of your pet's health. Choose high-quality food appropriate for their life stage.
tips: Avoid toxic foods like chocolate and grapes
